title: Can you support device 'X'?
content: We need the device in order to support it as well as device maintainer willing to maintain it.
If we don't support your device then check your device's thread on xda-developers to see if someone built unofficial builds for your device.

title: Incompatible apps on Play Store
content: SlimRoms use low DPI by default so either use Slim gapps or a multi DPI play store.

title: I have a high battery drain with your Rom. What can I do?
content: In most cases, battery drain isn't caused by the Rom.
Occasionally, it can be caused by the first google sync just after configuring google account.
Generally, it is caused by a badly coded or old app installed by the user.
